data.name: FreeDraw
data.detailed_description:
This game is an app that allows you to draw 3D pictures using brush tools in the virtual reality world. Users can also use the recording function on the left-hand UI panel in the Draw Room to record their appearance based on pre-positioned cameras.
The user can check the recorded video within the in-game.
data.about_the_game:
This game is an app that allows you to draw 3D pictures using brush tools in the virtual reality world. Users can also use the recording function on the left-hand UI panel in the Draw Room to record their appearance based on pre-positioned cameras.
The user can check the recorded video within the in-game.
data.short_description: This game is an app that allows you to draw 3D pictures using brush tools in the virtual reality world.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i5-4590
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 970, AMD 290
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i5-4590
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 970, AMD 290
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
